text:
Turns out it isn’t just for a dirty hair day

In case you haven’t noticed, the beloved ponytail is back in a BIG way. No longer reserved for dirty hair days or post-gym, A-listers are making a strong case for the popular hairstyle, often adding an extra twist to up the glam factor.

Whether it’s an epically voluminous updo or a sleek low style, the humble ponytail is becoming the super chic must-have celebs are obsessing over.

Check out our round-up of some of the best celebrity ponytails below:
title: Celebs are obsessing over this popular hairstyle
